user.title: Google Family Link – Setup
user.description: Configure the Google Family Link integration. After clicking Submit, the integration will attempt to open an automated browser login (Chromium). If that is not available on your platform, you will be guided to enter your session cookies manually in the next step.

data_description.update_interval: How often to poll Google Family Link for device state changes (30–3600 s).
data_description.timeout: Maximum time to wait for a response from Google (10–120 s).

cookies.title: Google Session Cookies
cookies.description:
Automated browser login is not available on this platform.

1. Install **[Cookie-Editor](https://cookie-editor.com/)** in Chrome, Firefox or Edge.
2. Open **[families.google.com]({familylink_url})** and log in.
3. Click the Cookie-Editor icon and choose **Export → Export as JSON**.
4. Paste the JSON into the field below.

data_description.cookies_json: Full JSON cookie array exported from your browser via Cookie-Editor.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate – Session Expired
reauth_confirm.description:
Your Google Family Link session has expired.

1. Install **[Cookie-Editor](https://cookie-editor.com/)** in Chrome, Firefox or Edge.
2. Open **[families.google.com]({familylink_url})** and log in.
3. Click the Cookie-Editor icon and choose **Export → Export as JSON**.
4. Paste the JSON into the field below.

data_description.cookies_json: Full JSON cookie array exported from your browser via Cookie-Editor.
